itemLabel: David Shutt, Baron Shutt of Greetland

wikipedia_page.main: David Trevor Shutt, Baron Shutt of Greetland,  (16 March 1942 – 30 October 2020) was a British Liberal Democrat politician who served as Captain of the Yeomen of the Guard and Deputy Chief Whip in the House of Lords between May 2010 and May 2012.

response: * David Shutt, Baron Shutt of Greetland OBE
* David Shutt, Baron Shutt of Greetland, British politician

**David Shutt, Baron Shutt of Greetland, 78, politician, member of the House of Lords (since 2000) and Captain of the Yeomen of the Guard (2010–2012).
